comments.body:
The base image **openjdk:8-alpine** uses **musl libc** instead of **glibc**, so certain library (like Intel MKL for native BLAS support in mllib) cannot run on the container.  
There is also report on openjdk compatibility issue on alpine (https://github.com/apache-spark-on-k8s/spark/issues/326). 
Should we change to a base image that supports glibc?
